A

ApduIOCardTerminal - class com.gemplus.opencard.terminal.apduio.ApduIOCardTerminal.
Pure Java CardTerminal dedicated to send APDUs to the JavaCard Simulator coming with the JavaCard Development Kit.
ApduIOCardTerminal(String, String, String) - Constructor for class com.gemplus.opencard.terminal.apduio.ApduIOCardTerminal
Instantiates a ApduIOCardTerminal object.
ApduIOCardTerminalFactory - class com.gemplus.opencard.terminal.apduio.ApduIOCardTerminalFactory.
A factory for creating an ApduIOCardTerminal.
ApduIOCardTerminalFactory() - Constructor for class com.gemplus.opencard.terminal.apduio.ApduIOCardTerminalFactory
